aka: On the Far Side of Twilight
this_title: アインシュタインは黄昏の向こうからやってくる
trans_title: On the Far Side of Twilight
introduction: He pulls out a pair of scissors that tends toward the sky. So begins his journey through time, space and memory. Seasons change, years pass. Wrapped in a mysterious box of sunset, the boy grows older, becomes adolescent, young man, adult, old, but – strangely – the memories are beginning to lead their own lives. “What memory, what reverie, what is real and what is imaginary? I do not know … ”
chinese_title: アインシュタインは黄昏の向こうからやってくる
